C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command: while [[ $(curl --fail --silent --connect-timeout 2 http://localhost:8081/artifactory/api/v1/system/liveness) =~ OK ]]; do echo Artifactory is still alive; sleep 2; done

containers.name: artifactory

command: if [[ -e "/var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/filebeat.yaml" ]]; then chmod 644 /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/filebeat.yaml; fi; echo "Copy system.yaml to /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc"; mkdir -p /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc; mkdir -p /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/access/keys/trusted; cp -fv /tmp/etc/system.yaml /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/system.yaml; echo "Copy binarystore.xml file"; mkdir -p /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/artifactory; cp -fv /tmp/etc/artifactory/binarystore.xml /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/artifactory/binarystore.xml; echo "Copy access.config.patch.yml to /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/access"; mkdir -p /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/access; cp -fv /tmp/etc/access.config.patch.yml /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/etc/access/access.config.patch.yml;
initContainers.name: copy-system-configurations
wait-for-db

command: scriptsPath="/opt/jfrog/artifactory/app/bin"; mkdir -p $scriptsPath; echo "Copy migration scripts and Run migration"; cp -fv /tmp/migrate.sh $scriptsPath/migrate.sh; cp -fv /tmp/migrationHelmInfo.yaml $scriptsPath/migrationHelmInfo.yaml; cp -fv /tmp/migrationStatus.sh $scriptsPath/migrationStatus.sh; mkdir -p /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/log; bash $scriptsPath/migrationStatus.sh 7.84.10 3600 > >(tee /var/opt/jfrog/artifactory/log/helm-migration.log) 2>&1;
initContainers.name: migration-artifactory
